cardsInfo.title: Plant Game One
cardsInfo.text: Guess the Scientific name of a random plant given its Common name by typing it!

cardsInfo.title: Plant Game Two
cardsInfo.text: Mobile-friendly version of the Plant Game, just tapping the correct Scientific name

cardsInfo.title: Plant Game Three
cardsInfo.text: Tap the image that fits the provided Common plant name, or ask for its Scientific name!

cardsInfo.title: Plant-a-Game
cardsInfo.text: Full RDF-Plants game, including different types of questions, timeouts, feedback,...

cardsInfo.title: Drag the Plant
cardsInfo.text: Drag and drop each plant in its correct Scientific slot

cardsInfo.title: Plant Wordsearch
cardsInfo.text: Find plant names through a letter soup
